column2:
"Hey, <%me>!
Are you here investigating, too?"
"Perfect. What do you say, you want to team up?"
"1. Go with Zeno and Echo."
"2. Investigate alone."

"That's what I like to hear! I can always
rest easy knowing you've got my back."
"Oh, and what about me?"

"Yes, yes, you're very reliable. And such a
charming conversationalist, too."

"Is it just me, or have I been getting even
less respect than usual lately?"

"Geez, Echo. Maybe I'm just feeling a little
crowded these days."

"Don't you get bored following me around day
after day after day? Maybe it's time you branch
out a little. Leave the nest!"
"What? I would never..."
"What was that? I can't hear you."

"Ugh, I wish I could say the same! Come
on, <%me>, let's ditch this jerk."

"Sheesh, why so sensitive? But hey, if
you've got that much fight in you, I guess
you're set for the mission."

"Let's just be careful. Something's not right
about this place. I don't like it."

"Oh, well. Maybe next time. If you run into
any snags, just give a call."
"Take care out there, <%me>."

"お、<%me>。
お前も調査に来たのか？"

"ちょうどいい。
俺たちと一緒に行かないか？"
"１．ゼノたちと行く"
"２．一人で調査を行う"

"そうこなくっちゃな。
お前が一緒だと安心感が違うぜ。"
"ちょっとゼノ、あたしは？"

"はいはい、エコーさんも
十二分に頼りになりますよ、っと。"

"……なんか、さいきんあたしの扱いが
ぞんざいになってきてない？"
"いい加減独り立ちしろってことだよ。"

"お前さ、いっつも
俺とばっかつるんでて
つまらなくないのか？"
"……そんなわけ、ないでしょ。"
"うん？　聞こえねえぞ？"

"うるさいバカ！
ほら、<%me>
こんなバカほっといて行きましょう！"

"ったく、何だってんだよ。
ま、あんだけ元気がありゃ大丈夫か。"

"……それより
<%me>
気を付けろよ。なんだか嫌な空気だ。"

"そうか、わかった。
んじゃ、何か困ったら連絡くれよ。"

"<%me>
それじゃあね。"
"Ruins"
"The Ruins of Planet Naberius"
"Ruin"
"惑星ナベリウス　遺跡"
